name: Xiali Sharon Hei
content: Xiali (Sharon) Hei’s Group | research,teaching,and so on… My primary research interests span broadly across the areas as follows. AI security and privacy Cyber-physical system security LLM model security Hardware Security Acoustic side-channel Captcha attacks and design My other interests include medical informatics, security & privacy of medical data. Google Scholar.
